Intercepted a digital contract signed with RSA and low exponent. The signature is here: 0x3d306cd1838cd3af7b441dcdac5480874962a1957c1b4254112a5cb0a617cb4d3f518320f26508d86db3ea3076c373dceb7fd3668de8d341a73ac1e498bbb7a7. Can you recover the message?

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{k4gzjkey}
ciphertext: 0x3d306cd1838cd3af7b441dcdac5480874962a1957c1b4254112a5cb0a617cb4d3f518320f26508d86db3ea3076c373dceb7fd3668de8d341a73ac1e498bbb7a7
